The success of a film production, a tv-commercial or a photo shoot is greatly determined by the location. When the location fits with the wanted atmosphere than the production will radiate and leave an unforgetable impression to your audience.
Our extensive location library contains homes and businesses locations, across the globe that we match to location requests we receive from producers of feature films, television movies, commercials, music videos, corporate media and still photography shoots.
If you wish your home, property or business arena to be considered for being a place utilized for a possible film shooting location please register your location with your digital photographs to our LOCATION BANK.
please send your digital photos to us by using our location submission form.  We will review your photos and, if approved, your property will be added to our photo location database. 
 

Unless otherwise indicated, all images remain the copyright of joinfilms.com [AVEPL]. No warranty is given by joinfilms.com [AVEPL] as to the availability or suitability of the locations for any particular project. The availability of all locations is subject to negotiation and contract; please contact us to discuss your requirements. Your use of our web site is dependent upon your acceptance of our Terms & Conditions.
